replies.msg:
利申：上緊同自學緊d cs online course，但佢完全冇講過點計就考....

In the field below, enter the integer value of the $v0 register after executing the following instruction, given the register values $gp = 99 :
ori $v0, $gp, 10020
ans: 10087

In the field below, enter the integer value of the $v0 register after executing the following instruction, given the register values $zero = 0, $t3 = 22 :
srl $v0, $t3, 15
ans: 0

In the field below, enter the integer value of the $v0 register after executing the following instruction, given the register values $t9 = 22 :
andi $v0, $t9, 27632
ans: 16

In the field below, enter the integer value of the $v0 register after executing the following instruction, given the register values $s2 = 92 :
andi $v0, $s2, 13500
ans: 28

我剩係識做
In the field below, enter the integer value of the $v0 register after executing the following instruction, given the register values $t2 = 30 :
addi $v0, $t2, 14648
ans: 14678

我上網搵都搵唔到有教學，可能唔識搵
有冇人知有冇咩書係可以好簡單但又完整咁講係點計?

replies.msg:
ori $v0, $gp, 10020


對番個表
rt = rs OR imm

$v0 = 99 | 10020
$v0 = 10087


我估係咁

https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/downloads-mips/documents/MIPS_Architecture_microMIPS64_InstructionSet_AFP_P_MD00594_06.04.pdf

Always look for documentation and spec
Or in other words: RTFM

If you don’t know what a specific instruction do (eg you don’t know what is bitwise logical OR is for ori), google that keyword.

If you don’t know why there is such an instruction (eg you don’t know what’s the purpose of doing bitwise logical OR), you should understand that this will be taught in the future. You need to know some common instructions first, before you know how they combine into a useful program.

Try to google yourself more before you ask. Not that I am not willing to answer. Searching skill is very important as you have to read a huge tons of manual in programming career.

replies.msg:
唔該你
不過我都係唔明，到底係個COURSE冇講定係我真係唔理解
例如佢有個好簡單既example，計add $t0, $s1, $s2
佢話"Next, we find the address numbers of the registers:
$t0 - 0x08
$s1 = 0x11
$s2 = 0x12"
我有表知道add既opcode同funct既碼係咩
但係我完全唔明$t0點解係0x08, $s1點解係0x11

就好似佢有一題係
「In the field below, enter the 32-bit hexadecimal representation of the following instruction: subu $s5, $s2, $t6
答案係0x24EA823」

我知道佢係代表緊$s2/$t6而且係unsigned
我知道subu既opcode係0x00、Funct係0x23
但我要點樣先知道$s2同$t6既碼係咩？

https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/downloads-mips/documents/MIPS_Architecture_microMIPS64_InstructionSet_AFP_P_MD00594_06.04.pdf

Always look for documentation and spec
Or in other words: RTFM

If you don’t know what a specific instruction do (eg you don’t know what is bitwise logical OR is for ori), google that keyword.

If you don’t know why there is such an instruction (eg you don’t know what’s the purpose of doing bitwise logical OR), you should understand that this will be taught in the future. You need to know some common instructions first, before you know how they combine into a useful program.

Try to google yourself more before you ask. Not that I am not willing to answer. Searching skill is very important as you have to read a huge tons of manual in programming career.

replies.msg:
This is a bit confusing because the “conventional name” of register is not in MIPS32 ref, but in MIPS32 quick ref
https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/downloads-mips/documents/MD00565-2B-MIPS32-QRC-01.01.pdf

However, you should still be able to google this yourself. Googling MIPS32 register gives me the following link:
http://www.cs.uwm.edu/classes/cs315/Bacon/Lecture/HTML/ch05s03.html
http://homepage.divms.uiowa.edu/~ghosh/1-28-10.pdf

You don’t need to understand. They are definition and names. You need to learn how to google the definition out. Don’t assume course will tell you. It is a course, not a fucking dictionary. You are expected to google yourself.

the link I gave is for microMIPS64, turns out you are working on MIPS32/MIPS64 I guess.
Get all the related spec here: https://www.mips.com/products/architectures/mips32-2/
